Description:
Dressed to impress.
As soon as you enter this family home you are wowed with space and quality. This quiet achiever comprises of master bedroom suite with ensuite and large walk in robe, a further three bedrooms all with built in robes and central family bathroom, open plan kitchen/dining/lounge area, formal lounge and theatre/rumpus room.
The kitchen features gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher, granit benchtops and walk in pantry. Other features include an abundance of storage with the walk in linen cupboard, evaporative cooling and gas ducted heating through out.
Outside enjoy the landscaped gardens and manicured lawns while relaxing on the north facing outdoor entertaining area which is decked and partially undercover to suite all climates.
Currently leased until January 2018 at $395 per week.
Insights: 12 Bellagio Court, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2017 and 6 other 4 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Fantastic Location
This spacious 1-bedroom unit is only a 2-5 minute drive to Geelong CBD & the South Geelong Train Station, with shopping centres, public transport, Gordon Tafe a stone throw away. Parking is a breeze in your very own undercover carport. Upon entering, you will find an immaculately renovated unit with pine polished floorboards. The fully renovated kitchen overlooking the lounge including an electric oven, gas cook top and a dishwasher. The master bedroom with built in robe.Other features of this fantastic unit include rear court yard, heating & cooling to give you year round comfort, combined with bathroom/laundry and great cupboard space. Great price, great location, what are you waiting for? Inspect today!

Description:
Rock solid home and investment.
This home is both a rock solid house to occupy or to invest in with proposed rent returns of approx $300 per week in the current market. Situated on a 574 square metre allotment, the position of the home allows for the enjoyment of a large back yard featuring a DLUG with power and a caravan which can be utilised as a workshop or the ultimate kids cubby house.The single carport has drive through access and remote roller door while all windows have external roller shutters for further security.
Internally the home comprises a spacious entrance hall that feeds to the lounge room and open plan kitchen/meals area, off the central hallway are three bedrooms all with built in robes, family bathroom, toilet and large laundry.
Features include gas heating, split system heating/cooling and ceiling fan in the lounge room, updated kitchen with dishwasher, gas cook top, electric oven, updated bathroom with large shower and separate bath.
From the lounge room, the sliding door gives direct access to the undercover outdoor entertaining area where you can peacefully enjoy the established landscaped gardens and let the kids play freely in the fully fenced large rear yard.
Get your family into their own home now or pick up this solid investment.
Insights: 139 Solar Drive, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2017 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Light this family fire again.
Bring new light and warmth to this family home again and realise its potential in this capital growth corridor. As you enter nostalgia via the front sun filled porch you are welcomed by a wide entrance hall, glass sliding doors lead you to the family lounge room with central fire place and split system heating/cooling for all year comfort. The home also comprises three large bedrooms all with built in robes, large central family bathroom, open plan kitchen/meals area featuring air conditioning and electric upright oven/cook top, laundry and toilet.
Set on a 659 square metre allotment this family home sure has solid bones (they don't build them like they used to)! Landscaped with immaculate rose gardens in the front yard and scattered established fruit trees in the rear yard. Offering a SLUG with power and water connected and wood shed at the rear of the property.
Begin a new chapter for this family home.

Description:
More Than Just A House!
An exceptional opportunity has presented itself in this quiet, well maintained street. Positioned centrally to all must have amenities and less than 10kms to Geelong's CBD and the Waterfront. This newly renovated three bedroom one bathroom family home is set on a generous allotment of approx. 670sqm of land and offers multiple extras to the savvy home buyer and astute investor with a potential rental yield of $330 per week approx.
Upon entry, the home exudes a fresh and bright sense of space with the high pitched ceilings opening onto the main open plan living, dining and kitchen zone. The kitchen is complete with brand new custom cabinetry and features stainless steel appliances. The three great sized bedrooms each feature built in wardrobes, newly laid carpets, ceiling fan lighting and are serviced by the central bathroom which comprises a deep soaking tub, stand up shower and vanity unit with an adjacent separate toilet. In addition the home offers quality block out blinds throughout for privacy and the gas heating and central ducted cooling ensures comfort all year around.
The front and rear yards offer ideal space for work, pets or play and the long driveway and lock up gates provide safe off street parking of an evening. Additional extras include solar panels, new roof and guttering, home sensor security system and much more. This property truly is more than just a house; it is an inviting ready to move into "home" to be enjoyed by young families, couples or a long term quality tenant with the added convenience of Newcomb's two shopping centres, the Gordon Tafe, primary and high schools and public transport all just a stone's throw away. Inspection is a must as this gem won't last long!

Description:
Ideal Investment
This very neat two-bedroom unit situated in a small complex is certainly an ideal investment. Freshly presented, having been recently painted this unit has new life. Both bedrooms are spacious, have windows and feature built in robes. Both rooms being serviced by a central family bathroom with separate toilet. Description:
A Cut Above The Rest
A fabulous opportunity in a tranquil court, central to all must have amenities including Newcomb Shopping Centre, Bellarine Village, Medical Clinics, primary and high schools, swim sport & leisure centre and walking trails all moments away.
This wonderful three bedroom one bathroom property offers multiple extras both inside and out for the savvy home buyer or astute investor. With a newly renovated chef's kitchen boasting loads of storage, gas stove top and fan forced electrical oven, plus gorgeous granite bench tops servicing the connecting dining room and making serving meals a breeze. With an ample sized front living, one can kick back and relax.
Three good sized bedrooms each with built-in robes, the main bathroom has been updated with new tile work and comprises a stand up shower, bath and separate toilet. Outdoor entertaining couldn't be easier with this huge paved under cover alfresco area, and positioned at the rear of the yard is a four car garage which currently makes as a man cave or teen retreat. All mod cons present include ducted heating, ceiling fans, solar panels, dishwasher and much more. This is an excellent opportunity to break in to the Geelong market & this neat as a pin home must be inspected ASAP. Estimated rental return $320.00 - $340.00 Vendor says sell!

Description:
The Perfect - Downsizer
Brand new and built to a standard, not to a budget is this wonderfully designed townhouse that could be the ultimate downsizer for those that want low maintenance surrounds within walking distance to everything, public transport, Newcomb shopping centres, primary & secondary schools, medical centre and Geelong CBD only 5 mins away.
The home itself comprises 3 spacious bedrooms all with built-in storage (master with WIR) while the lavish ensuite and pristine central bathroom with bath and shower service the household. The gorgeous and spacious living area utilizes its northerly aspect capturing abundant light and is further comforted by ducted heating. The kitchen has been fitted with quality stainless steel appliances with the sun drenched dining area offering a great outlook to the low maintenance yard.
Built to offer space to its new owner the home also includes large remote single garage and with everything on your doorstep you can leave the car at home and walk. With rental potential at $330 - $350 per week, and positioned in a family friendly street, this one won't last long, inspection is a must. Properties like this don't last long, enquire today!

Description:
Att: First Home Owners & Investors
This 2 bedroom unit sits on its own title and is perfect for downsizing or for the astute investor. Comprised of 2 large bedrooms with BIRs, open plan living, dining and kitchen. Good sized bathroom with full sized bath and shower, separate toilet and a laundry room with built-in linen cupboards. There is also an oversized single remote lock up garage with internal access for your extra storage needs. Add to this reverse cycle split system and gas boosted solar hot water service making for very comfortable living. Also having its own easy to maintain private courtyard and front yard. Quick walking distance to public transport, shopping centres, primary and secondary schools, and only 5 mins drive from the Geelong CBD, you couldn't ask for a better location. A must inspection

Description:
More Bang For Your Buck!
This fantastic quality, Simonds-built brick home offers first home buyers, downsizers and savvy investors an affordable entry point into the highly sought after Geelong market place. Centrally located to all of the must have amenities including the CBD, Eastern Beach, multiple Shopping Centre's, medical clinics, Primary, High Schools, The Gordon Tafe, Bellarine bike trail and plenty of public transport- all moments away.
This modern, low maintenance, three bedroom, two bathroom, single storey townhouse offers a spacious family friendly floor plan with open plan living, dining, kitchen zone comprising contemporary quality finishes throughout. The open plan living area is comfortably carpeted and the functional kitchen comprises stainless steel appliances, including gas stove, electric oven, dishwasher, ample storage and a bonus brekky bar.
The spacious master bedroom offers a large ensuite bathroom and a walk-in wardrobe, whilst the additional bedrooms feature built in robes and are serviced by a modern central bathroom with stand-up shower, bath, vanity and a separate toilet.
Additional extras include solar electricity and hot water, split system, gas wall heater, ceiling fans, quality blinds and curtains throughout the entire home, security system, single lock-up garage, landscaped frontage and a paved rear court yard with new fences. This really is an ideal place to call home or a fantastic set and forget investment option to add to your portfolio. With rental potential at $300 - $320 per week, and positioned in a family friendly street, this one won't last long, inspection is a must!
Settlement 60 Days - 10% Deposit, contact agent for other arrangements.
